atk-s0203a:94_8: samaṇo pana gotamo jambudīpe cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭoyeva,
atk-s0203a:94_9: kīdiso nu kho samaṇe gotame parinibbute sāvakānaṃ vivādo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0203a:94_12: satthā ca etaṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā ekaṃ desanaṃ kathessatī”ti.
atk-s0203a:94_15: Ujumeva bhagavato santikaṃ agantvā yenassa upajjhāyo āyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamīti attho.
atk-s0203a:97_3: ayañhi āyasmā divā nava vāre rattiṃ nava vāreti ekāhaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre upaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0203a:97_4: Divasassa pana satakkhattuṃ vā sahassakkhattuṃ vā gantukāmo samānopi na akāraṇā gacchati,
atk-s0203a:98_0: Ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānanti ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghamajjhe uppanno vivādo kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati?
atk-s0203a:98_1: Kosambakakkhandhake viya hi dvīsu bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti,
atk-s0203a:98_4: atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0203a:98_7: Tato tāsaṃ ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummadevatā bhijjanti.
atk-s0203a:98_8: Evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0203a:98_13: Te adhammaṃ pūretvā viharantā apāye nibbattanti.
atk-s0203a:98_14: Evaṃ ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghamajjhe uppanno vivādo bahūnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
atk-s0203a:99_1: Abhiññā desitāti mahābodhimūle nisinnena paccakkhaṃ katvā paveditā.
atk-s0203a:99_3: Bhagavato accayenāti etarahi bhagavantaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā sagāravā viharanti, tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a:99_4: uggatejatāya durāsadatāya vivādaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0203a:99_5: bhagavato pana accayena vivādaṃ janeyyunti vadati.
atk-s0203a:99_7: taṃ dassento ajjhājīve vā adhipātimokkhe vāti āha.
atk-s0203a:99_9: “bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena parivāre paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni,
atk-s0203a:99_10: tāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbasikkhāpadāni adhipātimokkhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a:99_11: Appamattako so ānandāti ajjhājīvaṃ adhipātimokkhañca ārabbha uppannavivādo nāma yasmā parassa kathāyapi
atk-s0203a:100_1: idhekacco “na sakkā uttarimanussadhammaṃ anullapantena kiñci laddhu”ntiādīni cintetvā ājīvahetu uttarimanussadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a:100_4: so bhikkhu arahātiādinā nayena sāmantajappanaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0203a:100_5: agilāno vā attano atthāya paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
atk-s0203a:100_6: bhikkhunī vā pana tāni viññāpetvā pāṭidesanīyaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0203a:100_7: yo koci dukkaṭavatthukaṃ yaṃkiñci sūpodanaviññattimeva vā karoti,
atk-s0203a:100_8: aññataraṃ vā pana paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karonto viharati,
atk-s0203a:100_11: yo sāsane pabbajitvā micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0203a:100_15: yvāhaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappemi,
atk-s0203a:100_17: Evaṃ parassa kathāyapi attano dhammatāyapi sallakkhetvā suppajaho hoti.
atk-s0203a:101_1: paṭipadāya vāti lokuttaramaggaṃ patvā vivādo nāma sabbaso vūpasammati,
atk-s0203a:102_2: So saddhivihārikādayo āgantvā vanditvā ṭhite pucchati “kiṃ āgatatthā”ti.
atk-s0203a:102_5: khaṇeneva arahattaṃ pāpetuṃ samatthakammaṭṭhānakathaṃ ācikkhissāmīti vatvā vadati –
atk-s0203a:102_6: “idha bhikkhu attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinno mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0203a:102_12: Ettāvatā maggappatto ceva phalappatto ca hotī”ti.
atk-s0203a:102_13: Atha te bhikkhū “akhīṇāsavo nāma evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0203a:103_1: Samantā bhikkhācāragāmehi manussā āgantvā pucchanti “kenaci, bhante,
atk-s0203a:103_3: Upāsakā pubbeva therena pañho kathito amhākanti.
atk-s0203a:103_4: Te pupphamaṇḍapaṃ pupphakūṭāgāraṃ sajjetvā suvaṇṇena akkhipidhānamukhapidhānādiṃ karitvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0203a:103_5: pūjetvā sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷikaṃ kīḷetvā jhāpetvā aṭṭhīni ādāya cetiyaṃ karonti.
atk-s0203a:103_6: Aññe āgantukā vihāraṃ āgantvā pāde dhovitvā “mahātheraṃ passissāma, kahaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0203a:103_11: Bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento iminā niyāmena kathesi, bhanteti. Na eso, āvuso, maggo,
atk-s0203a:103_15: Te kalahaṃ karontā uṭṭhahitvā “sakalavihāre bhikkhū ca bhikkhācāragāmesu manussā ca na jānanti,
atk-s0203a:103_18: kiṃ vo vihāradvāre cetiyaṃ na diṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0203a:104_0: Aparopi tādisova kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento evaṃ katheti –
atk-s0203a:104_1: citteneva tīsu uddhanesu tīṇi kapallāni āropetvā heṭṭhā aggiṃ katvā citteneva attano dvattiṃsākāraṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0203a:104_2: kapallesu pakkhipitvā citteneva daṇḍakena parivattetvā parivattetvā bhajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a:105_1: citteneva mahācāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā matthuṃ yojetvā citteneva attano dvattiṃsākāraṃ uppāṭetvā tattha pakkhipitvā matthuṃ otāretvā manthitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a:105_5: Ettāvatā vo amataṃ paribhuttaṃ nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0203a:105_6: Ito paraṃ “atha te bhikkhū”tiādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a:106_5: Ettha pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti,
atk-s0203a:106_7: nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamati,
atk-s0203a:106_12: nhānatitthe uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0203a:106_13: parinibbute vā pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0203a:106_14: cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a:106_17: sammāsabuddhassa nāma lajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “tūṇhī hoti,
atk-s0203a:107_0: Yo pana dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0203a:108_0: Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0203a:108_12: Ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate saṅghe katoyeva hoti.
atk-s0203a:108_13: Tisso sikkhā pana aparipūrayamānova sikkhāya na paripūrakārī nāma.
atk-s0203a:109_0: Ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā. Bāhiddhāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā.
atk-s0203a:110_1: Idāni ayaṃ cha ṭhānāni nissāya uppannavivādo vaḍḍhanto yāni adhikaraṇāni pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a:110_3: Tattha vūpasamanatthāya pavattamānehi samathehi adhikātabbānīti adhikaraṇāni.
atk-s0203a:111_0: Idāni imānipi cattāri adhikaraṇāni patvā upari vaḍḍhento so vivādo yehi samathehi vūpasammati,
atk-s0203a:112_1: adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vāti aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
atk-s0203a:112_3: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
atk-s0203a:112_5: Mātikāyaṃ āgatā pañca vibhaṅge dveti satta āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a:112_6: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a:113_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
atk-s0203a:113_5: tattha saṅghena vā gaṇena vā vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati.
atk-s0203a:113_6: Evaṃ sammamāne pana tasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā,
atk-s0203a:114_0: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa sāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
atk-s0203a:115_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti.
atk-s0203a:115_2: Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhakaṃ sammannitvā tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu
atk-s0203a:115_3: tīsu salākaggāhesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā
atk-s0203a:115_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:116_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
atk-s0203a:116_7: ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati.
atk-s0203a:117_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a:117_1: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:117_2: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0203a:118_0: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi vuccamāno –
atk-s0203a:118_3: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
atk-s0203a:118_4: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a:118_5: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:118_6: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0203a:119_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenāññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa –
atk-s0203a:119_4: ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a:119_5: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassa pāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:120_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
atk-s0203a:120_2: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
atk-s0203a:120_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
atk-s0203a:120_4: Tattha sammukhāvinayo tāva yo ca deseti,
atk-s0203a:120_8: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati.
atk-s0203a:121_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
atk-s0203a:121_2: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0203a:121_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
atk-s0203a:121_4: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsupagatā “na me taṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti,
atk-s0203a:121_6: sabbesampi ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0203a:122_0: Imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
atk-s0203a:122_1: Tena vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
atk-s0203a:123_3: so etena nayena saṅkhepatova vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:123_4: Tattha dhammotiādīsu suttantapariyāyena tāva dasa kusalakammapathā dhammo,
atk-s0203a:123_6: Tathā “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti heṭṭhā āgatā sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā,
atk-s0203a:123_7: tayo satipaṭṭhānā tayo sammappadhānā tayo iddhipādā cha indriyāni cha balāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā navaṅgiko maggo cāti,
atk-s0203a:123_8: cattāro upādānā pañca nīvaraṇānītiādayo saṅkaliṭṭhadhammā cāti ayaṃ adhammo.
atk-s0203a:124_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci ekaṃ adhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā “imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāma,
atk-s0203a:124_2: mayañca loke pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti taṃ adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathentā dhammoti vivadanti.
atk-s0203a:124_3: Tattheva dhammakoṭṭhāsesu ekaṃ gahetvā “adhammo aya”nti kathentā adhammoti vivadanti.
atk-s0203a:125_0: Vinayapariyāyena pana bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā yathāpaṭiññāya kātabbakammaṃ dhammo nāma,
atk-s0203a:125_1: abhūtena pana vatthunā acodetvā asāretvā apaṭiññāya katabbakammaṃ adhammo nāma.
atk-s0203a:125_2: Tesupi adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathentā dhammoti vivadanti,
atk-s0203a:126_0: Suttantapariyāyena pana rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo saṃvaro pahānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ vinayo nāma,
atk-s0203a:126_1: rāgādīnaṃ avinayo asaṃvaro appahānaṃ appaṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ avinayo nāma.
atk-s0203a:126_2: Vinayapariyāyena vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anusāvanasampatti sīmasampati parisasampattīti ayaṃ vinayo nāma,
atk-s0203a:126_5: Tesupi yaṃkiñci avinayaṃ “vinayo aya”nti kathentā vinayoti vivadanti,
atk-s0203a:127_0: Dhammanetti samanumajjitabbāti dhammarajju anumajjitabbā ñāṇena ghaṃsitabbā upaparikkhitabbā.
atk-s0203a:127_1: Sā panesā dhammanetti “iti kho vaccha ime dasa dhammā akusalā dasa dhammā kusalā”ti evaṃ mahāvacchagottasutte āgatāti vuttā.
atk-s0203a:127_3: yo vā idha dhammoti ca vinayo ca vutto.
atk-s0203a:127_4: Yathā tattha sametīti yathā tāya dhammanettiyā sameti,
atk-s0203a:127_9: Tathā tanti evaṃ taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a:127_11: sammukhāvinayo pana na kismiñci adhikaraṇe na labbhati.
atk-s0203a:128_1: Taṃ panetaṃ yasmā dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca,
atk-s0203a:128_2: tasmā heṭṭhā mātikāya ṭhapitānukkamena idāni sativinayassa vāre pattepi taṃ avatvā vivādādhikaraṇayeva tāva dutiyasamathaṃ dassento kathañcānanda,
atk-s0203a:128_4: Tattha bahutarāti antamaso dvīhi tīhipi atirekatarā.
atk-s0203a:129_1: Idāni heṭṭhā avitthāritaṃ sativinayaṃ ādiṃ katvā vitthāritāvasesasamathe paṭipāṭiyā vitthāretuṃ kathañcānanda,
atk-s0203a:129_3: Tattha pārājikasāmantena vāti dve sāmantāni khandhasāmantañca āpattisāmantañca.
atk-s0203a:129_7: dubbhāsitāpattikkhandhoti evaṃ purimassa pacchimakhandhaṃ khandhasāmantaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a:129_10: Tattha khandhasāmante pārājikasāmantaṃ garukāpatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a:130_1: Bhāsitaparikkantanti vācāya bhāsitaṃ kāyena ca parikkantaṃ,
atk-s0203a:131_2: Ravāti aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmena aññaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kho, ānanda,
atk-s0203a:131_3: tassapāpiyasikā hotīti tassapuggalassa pāpussannatā pāpiyasikā hoti.
atk-s0203a:132_2: tiṇavatthārakoti ettha idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā tiṇavatthārakoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a:132_3: Yathā hi gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ duggandhatāya bādhati,
atk-s0203a:132_4: tiṇehi avattharitvā suppaṭicchāditassa panassa so gandho na bādhati,
atk-s0203a:132_5: evameva yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlānumūlaṃ gantvā vūpasamiyamānaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0203a:132_6: taṃ iminā kammena vūpasantaṃ gūthaṃ viya tiṇavatthārakena paṭicchannaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotīti idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā tiṇavatthārakoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a:132_11: Ettha pana thullavajjanti thūllavajjaṃ pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca.
atk-s0203a:132_12: Gihipaṭisaṃyuttanti gihīnaṃ hīnena khuṃsanavambhanadhammikapaṭissavesu āpannā āpatti.
atk-s0203a:132_14: Kiccādhikaraṇassa pana vasena idha na kiñci vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a:133_1: dhammā sāraṇīyāti heṭṭhā kalahavasena suttaṃ āraddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a:137_3: Byākatāti khīṇā jātītiādīhi catūhi padehi kathitā.
atk-s0203a:137_5: anadhigate adhigatasaññino hutvā adhigataṃ amhehīti mānena byākariṃsu.
atk-s0203a:138_1: Evañcettha sunakkhatta tathāgatassa hotīti sunakkhatta ettha etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañhabyākaraṇe –
atk-s0203a:138_4: handa nesaṃ visodhetvā pākaṭaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desemī”ti,
atk-s0203a:138_7: tassapi hoti aññathattanti bhagavā paṭipannakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0203a:138_8: Yattha pana icchācāre ṭhitā ekacce moghapurisā honti,
atk-s0203a:138_10: “ime imaṃ pañhaṃ uggahetvā ajānitvāva jānantā viya appatte pattasaññino hutvā gāmanigamādīsu visevamānā vicarissanti,
atk-s0203a:138_11: taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti evamassāyaṃ icchācāre ṭhitānaṃ kāraṇā paṭipannakānampi
atk-s0203a:138_12: atthāya “dhammaṃ desissāmī”ti uppannassa cittassa aññathābhāvo hoti.
atk-s0203a:139_2: lokāmisabhūtesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu adhimutto tanninno taggaruko tappabbhāro.
atk-s0203a:139_6: Āneñjasaṃyojanena hi kho visaṃyuttoti āneñjasamāpattisaṃyojanena visaṃsaṭṭho.
atk-s0203a:139_7: Lokāmisādhimuttoti evarūpo hi lūkhacīvaradharo mattikāpattaṃ ādāya attano sadisehi katipayehi saddhiṃ paccantajanapadaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0203a:139_8: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakāle manussā disvā “mahāpaṃsukulikā āgatā”ti yāgubhattādīni sampādetvā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0203a:139_12: ajjāpi vo bahūnaṃ dinnanti. Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0203a:139_13: antovassaṃ idha vaseyyāthāti adhivāsetvā vihāramaggaṃ pucchitvā vihāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0203a:139_15: Sāyaṃ eko āvāsiko te bhikkhū pucchati “kattha piṇḍāya caritthā”ti?
atk-s0203a:139_18: Āma evarūpā nāma manussānaṃ saddhā hoti.
atk-s0203a:139_23: Tato te paṃsukulikā punappunaṃ tesaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0203a:139_25: Ettāvatā icchācāre ṭhitassa sīsaṃ nikkhantaṃ hoti udaraṃ phālitaṃ.
atk-s0203a:140_1: Idāni āneñjasamāpattilābhiṃ adhimānikaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panetantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:140_2: Āneñjādhimuttassāti kilesasiñcanavirahitāsu heṭṭhimāsu chasu samāpattīsu adhimuttassa tanninnassa taggaruno tappabbhārassa.
atk-s0203a:140_4: Cha samāpattilābhino hi adhimānikassa pañcakāmaguṇāmisabandhanā patitapaṇḍupalāso viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a:141_1: Idāni ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti lābhino adhimānikassa nighaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:141_3: Appaṭisandhikāti khuddakā muṭṭhipāsāṇamattā jatunā vā silesena vā allīyāpetvā paṭisandhātuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0203a:141_6: Upari samāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpatti dvedhābhinnā selā viya hoti,
atk-s0203a:142_1: Idāni nevasaññānāsaññāyatanalābhino adhimānikassa ca nighaṃsaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:142_3: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpattiyo vantasadisā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0203a:143_1: Idāni khīṇāsavassa nighaṃsaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:143_3: Upari samāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpatti mūlacchinnatālo viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0203a:144_2: Heṭṭhā hi samāpattilābhino adhimānikassapi khīṇāsavassapi nighaṃso kathito,
atk-s0203a:144_3: sukkhavipassakassa pana adhimānikassapi khīṇāsavassapi na kathito.
atk-s0203a:144_4: Tesaṃ dvinnampi nighaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a:144_6: Samāpattilābhino hi adhimānikassa nighaṃse kathite sukkhavipassakassapi adhimānikassa kathitova hoti,
atk-s0203a:144_7: samāpattilābhino ca khīṇāsavassa kathite sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassa kathitova hoti.
atk-s0203a:144_8: Etesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyāsappāyaṃ kathetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a:145_5: Visaṃ nāma jānitvā khāditampi ajānitvā khāditampi visameva.
atk-s0203a:145_6: Na hi khīṇāsavenapi “ahaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti asaṃvutena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a:146_2: Chandarāgabyāpādenāti so avijjāsaṅkhāto visadoso chandarāgena ca byāpādena ca ruppati kuppati.
atk-s0203a:146_7: Analañca te antarāyāyāti jīvitantarāyaṃ te kātuṃ asamatthaṃ.
atk-s0203a:146_8: Rajosūkanti rajo ca vīhisukādi ca sūkaṃ.
atk-s0203a:146_9: Asu ca visadosoti so ca visadoso.
atk-s0203a:146_10: Tadubhayenāti yā sā asappāyakiriyā ca yo visadoso ca,
atk-s0203a:147_0: Evameva khoti ettha saupādānasalluddhāro viya appahīno avijjāvisadoso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a:147_1: asappāyakiriyāya ṭhitabhāvo viya chasu dvāresu asaṃvutakālo,
atk-s0203a:147_2: tadubhayena vaṇe puthuttaṃ gate maraṇaṃ viya sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattanaṃ,
atk-s0203a:147_3: maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ viya aññatarāya garukāya saṃkiliṭṭhāya āpattiyā āpajjanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a:149_0: Idāni khīṇāsavassa balaṃ dassento so vatātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:149_2: Iti viditvā nirupadhīti evaṃ jānitvā kilesupadhipahānā nirupadhi hoti,
atk-s0203a:149_4: Upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttoti upadhīnaṃ saṅkhayabhūte nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-s0203a:149_8: taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto khīṇāsavo pañca kāmaguṇe sevituṃ,
atk-s0203a:149_9: kāyaṃ vā upasaṃharissati cittaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0203a:153_6: Na hi tucchamuṭṭhīti vutte muṭṭhi nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:153_11: khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca na paññāyittha,
atk-s0203a:153_12: katipāheneva supinake diṭṭhā viya nassanti na paññāyanti.
atk-s0203a:153_14: māyākatametanti yathā māyāya udakaṃ maṇīti katvā dassitaṃ,
atk-s0203a:153_16: aññaṃ vā pana evarūpaṃ dassanūpacāre ṭhitasseva tathā paññāyati,
atk-s0203a:153_19: Yathā ca māyākāro udakādīni maṇiādīnaṃ vasena dassento vañceti,
atk-s0203a:153_20: evaṃ kāmāpi aniccādīni niccādisabhāvaṃ dassentā vañcentīti vañcanakaṭṭhenapi “māyākata”nti vuttā.
atk-s0203a:153_23: mayhaṃ hiraññaṃ mayhaṃ suvaṇṇanti evaṃ bālānaṃ lāpanato bālalāpanaṃ.
atk-s0203a:153_28: Ubhayametaṃ māradheyyanti ete kāmā ca kāmasaññā ca ubhayampi māradheyyaṃ.
atk-s0203a:154_0: Mārassesa visayotiādīsupi yathā coḷassa visayo coḷavisayo,
atk-s0203a:154_2: saṃvarānaṃ visayo saṃvaravisayoti pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ visayoti vuccati,
atk-s0203a:154_6: Pañca pana kāmaguṇe nivāpabījaṃ viya vippakiranto māro gacchati.
atk-s0203a:154_10: Yathā ca yattha hatthiādayo vasaṃ vattenti,
atk-s0203a:155_3: duvidhe tāva kāme ārabbha abhijjhānalakkhaṇā abhijjhā,
atk-s0203a:155_9: yo evarūpo cittassa āghātoti evaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a:155_12: Idha manusikkhatoti imasmiṃ sāsane sikkhantassa te tayopi kilesā antarāyakarā honti.
atk-s0203a:155_19: Subhāvitanti pana etaṃ kāmāvacarādīnaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a:155_21: Tasmā etassa vasena aparittaṃ appamāṇaṃ subhāvitanti sabbaṃ lokuttarameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a:156_0: Tabbahulavihārinoti kāmapaṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:156_1: Āyatane cittaṃ pasīdatīti kāraṇe cittaṃ pasīdati.
atk-s0203a:156_7: Sampasāde satīti ettha duvidho sampasādo adhimokkhasampasādo ca paṭilābhasampasādo ca.
atk-s0203a:156_8: Arahattassa hi vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā viharato mahābhūtādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yenime nīhārena mahābhūtā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0203a:156_12: ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmīti appaṭiladdheyeva āsā santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a:156_14: Tatiyajjhānaṃ vā pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānatthāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontassa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādīni
atk-s0203a:156_18: saṅkhāragataṃ vā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā dibbacakkhukassa paraloko viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0203a:156_19: cittuppādo lepapiṇḍe laggamāno viya upacārena samādhiyati,
atk-s0203a:156_20: ajjeva catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmīti apaṭiladdheyeva āsā santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a:156_24: Yo pana arahattaṃ vā paṭilabhati catutthajjhānaṃ vā,
atk-s0203a:156_26: Idha pana “āyatane cittaṃ pasīdatī”ti vacanato arahattavipassanāya ceva catutthajjhānūpacārassa ca paṭilābho paṭilābhasampasādoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:157_1: Paññāya vā adhimuccatīti ettha etarahi vā paññāya adhimuccati,
atk-s0203a:157_2: āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatīti evaṃ padaparivattanaṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:157_4: tasmiṃ sampasāde sati etarahi vā paññāya adhimuccati,
atk-s0203a:157_7: atha vā paññāya vā adhimuccatīti arahattamaggaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0203a:157_9: Arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ asakkonto etarahi catusaccaṃ vā sacchikaroti.
atk-s0203a:158_1: idha bhikkhu tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānassa kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0203a:158_11: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0203a:158_13: Arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkonto pana tato osakkitamānaso antarā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a:158_16: Yathā puriso “vanamahiṃsaṃ ghātessāmī”ti sattiṃ gahetvā anubandhanto sace taṃ ghāteti,
atk-s0203a:158_18: asakkonto pana antarāmagge sasagodhādayo khuddakamige ghātetvā kājaṃ pūretvā etiyeva.
atk-s0203a:159_0: Tattha purisassa sattiṃ gahetvā vanamahiṃsānubandhanaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānassa parikammakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a:159_4: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattassa sacchikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a:159_5: mahiṃsaṃ ghātetuṃ asakkontassa antarāmagge sasagodhādayo khuddakamige ghātetvā kājaṃ pūretvā gamanaṃ viya arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkontassa,
atk-s0203a:160_0: Idāni arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkontassa nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ dassento kāyassa bhedātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:160_1: Tattha yanti yena kāraṇena taṃ saṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa āneñjūpagaṃ,
atk-s0203a:160_3: Ettha ca taṃsaṃvattanikanti tassa bhikkhuno saṃvattanikaṃ.
atk-s0203a:160_4: Yena vipākaviññāṇena so bhikkhu saṃvattati nibbattati,
atk-s0203a:160_9: Yaṃ tassa bhikkhuno saṃvattanikaṃ upapattihetubhūtaṃ kusalaviññāṇaṃ āneñjūpagataṃ assa,
atk-s0203a:160_17: āneñjūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti iminā nayena veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:160_21: Iti imasmiṃ paṭhamakaāneñje samādhivasena osakkanā kathitā.
atk-s0203a:161_1: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti catutthajjhānaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:161_2: Ayañhi bhikkhu heṭṭhimena bhikkhunā paññavantataro tassa ca bhikkhuno attano cāti dvinnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:161_3: Tabbahulavihārinoti rūpapaṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:161_8: Iti imasmiṃ dutiyaāneñje vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a:161_9: “yaṃkiñci rūpa”nti evaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ dassentena kathitāti attho.
atk-s0203a:162_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:162_1: Ayañhi heṭṭhā dvīhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti tiṇṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:162_2: Ubhayametaṃ aniccanti ettha aṭṭha ekekakoṭṭhāsā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikavasena pana saṅkhipitvā ubhayanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a:162_3: Nālaṃ abhinanditunti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinandituṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a:162_5: Tabbahulavihārinoti kāmapaṭibāhanena ca rūpapaṭibāhanena ca tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:163_1: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:163_2: Ayañhi heṭṭhā tīhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti catunnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:163_3: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā etā heṭṭhā vuttā sabbasaññā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0203a:163_4: Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti etaṃ aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya ca santaṃ,
atk-s0203a:163_6: Tabbahulavihārinoti tāsaṃ saññānaṃ paṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:164_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanameva patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:164_1: Ayañhi heṭṭhā catūhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti pañcannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:164_2: Attena vā attaniyena vāti ahaṃ mamāti gahetabbena suññaṃ tucchaṃ rittaṃ.
atk-s0203a:164_4: Tabbahulavihārinoti heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipadañca imañca suññatapaṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:165_1: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanameva patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:165_2: Ayañhi heṭṭhā pañcahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti channampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:165_4: na ca mama kvacani kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthīti ettha pana catukoṭikā suññatā kathitā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a:165_5: Ayañhi nāhaṃ kvacanīti kvaci attānaṃ na passati,
atk-s0203a:165_6: kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati,
atk-s0203a:165_7: attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upagantvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
atk-s0203a:165_8: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama –
atk-s0203a:165_9: saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā na ca kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatīti ayamattho.
atk-s0203a:165_11: saddaṃ āharitvā mama kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthīti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passati.
atk-s0203a:165_12: Attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa
atk-s0203a:165_13: attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
atk-s0203a:165_14: Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a:165_15: na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a:165_17: na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a:165_19: Tabbahulavihārinoti heṭṭhā vuttappaṭipadaṃ imaṃ catukoṭisuññatañca bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:166_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:166_1: Ayañhi heṭṭhā chahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti sattannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:166_2: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ patvā ettha etā heṭṭhā vuttā sabbasaññā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0203a:166_3: Tabbahulavihārinoti tāsaṃ saññānaṃ paṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a:167_1: No cassa no ca me siyāti sace mayhaṃ pubbe pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ na āyūhitaṃ assa,
atk-s0203a:167_2: yaṃ me idaṃ etarahi evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ etaṃ me na siyā nappavatteyyāti attho.
atk-s0203a:167_3: Na bhavissatīti sace etarahi pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ āyūhitaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a:167_4: Na me bhavissatīti tasmiṃ asati anāgate me pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a:167_5: Yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ pajahāmīti yaṃ atthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ etarahi khandhapañcakaṃ,
atk-s0203a:167_7: Evaṃ upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ vipassanupekkhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0203a:168_1: bhikkhu na vā parinibbāyeyyāti kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati,
atk-s0203a:168_2: tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa arahattampi osakkanāpi paṭipadāpi paṭisandhipi kathitā,
atk-s0203a:168_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa na kiñci kathitaṃ,
atk-s0203a:168_7: So taṃ upekkhaṃ abhinandatīti so taṃ vipassanupekkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinandanāhi abhinandati.
atk-s0203a:168_9: Tannissitaṃ hoti viññāṇanti viññāṇaṃ vipassanānissitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:168_11: taṃ tassa upādānaṃ nāma gahaṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a:168_13: Na parinibbāyatīti vipassanāya sālayo bhikkhu mama sāsane na parinibbāyati.
atk-s0203a:168_20: so kira bhikkhu gahetabbaṭṭhānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati,
atk-s0203a:169_1: Nissāya nissāyāti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ nissāya.
atk-s0203a:169_3: tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhuno oghanittharaṇā kathitā…pe…
atk-s0203a:169_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhuno oghanittharaṇā kathitāti vadati.
atk-s0203a:170_2: Samāpattiṃ tāva padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhu nāvaṃ vā uḷumpādīni
atk-s0203a:170_3: vā nissāya mahoghaṃ taritvā pāraṃ gacchanto viya na kilamati.
atk-s0203a:170_4: Sukkhavipassako pana pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto bāhubalena sotaṃ chinditvā pāraṃ gacchanto viya kilamati.
atk-s0203a:170_5: Iti imassa sukkhavipassakassa arahattaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a:170_7: Ayañhi heṭṭhā aṭṭhahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti navannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a:170_8: Esa sakkāyo yāvatā sakkāyoti yattako tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhāto sakkāyo nāma atthi,
atk-s0203a:170_10: na ito paraṃ sakkāyo atthīti paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:171_0: Etaṃ amataṃ yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti yo panesa cittassa anupādāvimokkho nāma,
atk-s0203a:171_1: etaṃ amataṃ etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a:171_2: Aññattha ca “anupādā cittassa vimokkho”ti nibbānaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0203a:171_3: Imasmiṃ pana sutte sukkhavipassakassa arahattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a:172_0: Kevalaṃ pana imasmiṃ sutte sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a:172_2: navasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a:172_3: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ tāva pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a:172_8: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā ṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a:172_11: Tathā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno.
atk-s0203a:172_12: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa pana osakkanā natthi,
atk-s0203a:172_18: Imañca pana sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanaṃ aṭṭhasu paṭisandhiṃ navasu arahattaṃ samodhānetvā kathentena imaṃ āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ sukathitaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0203a:176_2: Tattha yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti yāva paṭhamasopānaphalakā ekadivaseneva sattabhūmiko pāsādo na sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0203a:176_3: vatthuṃ sodhetvā thambhussāpanato paṭṭhāya pana yāva cittakammakaraṇā anupubbakiriyā cettha paññāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a:176_4: Yadidaṃ ajjheneti tayopi vedā na sakkā ekadivaseneva adhīyituṃ,
atk-s0203a:176_5: etesaṃ ajjhenepi pana anupubbakiriyāva paññāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a:176_6: Issattheti āvudhavijjāyapi ekadivaseneva vālavedhi nāma na sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0203a:176_7: ṭhānasampādanamuṭṭhikaraṇādīhi pana etthāpi anupubbakiriyā paññāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a:176_9: Tattha anupubbakiriyaṃ attanāva dassento evaṃ gaṇāpemātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:177_1: Seyyathāpi brāhmaṇāti idha bhagavā yasmā bāhirasamaye yathā yathā sippaṃ uggaṇhanti,
atk-s0203a:177_3: tasmā attano sāsanaṃ bāhirasamayena anupametvā bhadraassājānīyena upamento seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0203a:177_4: Bhadro hi assājānīyo yasmiṃ kāraṇe damito hoti,
atk-s0203a:177_6: Evameva sāsane sammāpaṭipanno kulaputto sīlavelaṃ nātikkamati.
atk-s0203a:178_2: Dve hi khīṇāsavā satatavihārī ca nosatatavihārī ca.
atk-s0203a:178_3: Tattha satatavihārī yaṃkiñci kammaṃ katvāpi phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0203a:178_4: no satatavihārī pana appamattakepi kicce kiccappasuto hutvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0203a:179_1: eko kira khīṇāsavatthero khīṇāsavasāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā araññavāsaṃ gato,
atk-s0203a:179_4: taṃ vitakkento thero ekadivasampi phalasamāpattiṃ appetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0203a:179_5: Sāmaṇero pana temāsaṃ phalasamāpattiratiyā vītināmetvā “sappāyo, bhante,
atk-s0203a:179_10: so ime dhamme ādito paṭṭhāya āvajjitvāva samāpajjituṃ sakkhissatīti dassento “satisampajaññāya cā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a:180_1: bho gotamāti tathāgate kira kathayanteva brāhmaṇassa “ime puggalā na ārādhenti,
atk-s0203a:185_3: dhātubhājanīyaṃ katvā dhammasaṅgītiṃ kātuṃ rājagahaṃ āgatakāle.
atk-s0203a:185_4: Rañño pajjotassa āsaṅkamānoti caṇḍapajjoto nāmesa rājā bimbisāramahārājassa sahāyo ahosi,
atk-s0203a:185_5: jīvakaṃ pesetvā bhesajjakāritakālato paṭṭhāya pana daḷhamittova jāto,
atk-s0203a:185_6: so “ajātasattunā devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitā ghātito”ti sutvā “mama piyamittaṃ ghātetvā esa rajjaṃ karissāmīti maññati,
atk-s0203a:185_7: mayhaṃ sahāyassa sahāyānaṃ atthikabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti parisati vācaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0203a:186_1: ayañca mahesakkho rājavallabho saṅgahe kate veḷuvanassa ārakkhaṃ kareyyāti maññamāno upasaṅkami.
atk-s0203a:186_6: Cha hi satthāro paṭhamataraṃ appaññātakulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā,
atk-s0203a:186_11: tassa accayena sāvakānaṃ mahāvivādo bhavissatīti ayaṃ kathā sakalajambudīpaṃ pattharamānā udapādi.
atk-s0203a:186_12: Sammāsambuddhe ca dharante bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo nāhosi.
atk-s0203a:186_16: “aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ apavāhituṃ samatthassa vātassa purato purāṇapaṇṇaṃ kiṃ ṭhassati,
atk-s0203a:186_17: dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattassa satthu alajjamāno maccurājā kassa lajjissatī”ti mahāsaṃvegaṃ
atk-s0203a:186_18: janetvā bhiyyosomattāya bhikkhū samaggā jātā ativiya upasantupasantā,
atk-s0203a:186_19: kiṃ nu kho etanti idaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a:187_1: Atthi nu khoti ayampi heṭṭhimapucchameva pucchati.
atk-s0203a:187_3: Ko hetu sāmaggiyāti tumhākaṃ samaggabhāvassa ko hetu ko paccayo.
atk-s0203a:188_2: Āpatti hoti vītikkamoti ubhayametaṃ buddhassa āṇātikkamanameva.
atk-s0203a:188_3: Yathādhammaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ kāremāti yathā dhammo ca anusiṭṭhi ca ṭhitā,
atk-s0203a:189_0: Na kira no bhavanto kārenti dhammo no kāretīti padadvayepi no kāro nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0203a:189_1: Evaṃ sante na kira bhavanto kārenti,
atk-s0203a:190_2: Kahaṃ pana bhavaṃ ānandoti kiṃ therassa veḷuvane vasanabhāvaṃ na jānātīti? Jānāti.
atk-s0203a:190_5: Kasmā pana tena tattha ārakkhā dinnā?
atk-s0203a:190_6: So kira ekadivasaṃ mahākaccāyanattheraṃ gijjhakūṭā otarantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0203a:190_15: pacchā me makkaṭabhūtakāle gocaraṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti veḷuvane nānāvidhe rukkhe ropetvā ārakkhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0203a:190_16: Aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā makkaṭo hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0203a:190_19: bho ānandāti evaṃ therena parisamajjhe attano ukkaṃsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā ahampi theraṃ ukkaṃsissāmīti evamāha.
atk-s0203a:191_2: brāhmaṇāti thero kira cintesi “sammāsambuddhena vaṇṇitajjhānampi atthi,
atk-s0203a:191_4: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo sabbameva vaṇṇetīti pañhaṃ visaṃvādeti,
atk-s0203a:191_5: na kho pana sakkā imassa mukhaṃ ulloketuṃ na piṇḍapātaṃ rakkhituṃ,
atk-s0203a:191_6: pañhaṃ ujuṃ katvā kathessāmī”ti idaṃ vattuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0203a:191_9: so bhagavā jhānaṃ vaṇṇesīti idha sabbasaṅgāhakajjhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a:192_0: Yaṃ no mayanti ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo vassakārabrāhmaṇaṃ usūyati,
atk-s0203a:192_1: tena pucchitapañhassa akathanaṃ paccāsīsamāno kathitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “vassakārena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ punappunaṃ tassa nāmaṃ gaṇhanto vitthāretvā kathesi,
atk-s0203a:192_2: mayā pucchitapañhaṃ pana yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva kathesī”ti anattamano ahosi,
atk-s0203a:196_5: Upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0203a:196_21: Evaṃ puṇṇāya puṇṇamāyāti imasmiṃ padadvaye attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:197_1: Tena hi tvaṃ bhikkhu sake āsane nisīditvā pucchāti kasmā bhagavā ṭhitassa akathetvā nisīdāpesīti.
atk-s0203a:197_2: Ayaṃ kira bhikkhu saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhāniyabhikkhūnaṃ saṅghatthero saṭṭhi bhikkhū gahetvā araññe vasati,
atk-s0203a:197_3: te tassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭenti vāyamanti.
atk-s0203a:197_6: Atha ne ācariyupaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisinne thero mahābhūtapariggahādīni pucchati.
atk-s0203a:197_8: maggaphalapañhaṃ pucchitā pana kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a:197_13: Evaṃ santepi maggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a:197_17: atha nesaṃ satthā cariyavasena dhammaṃ desessatī”ti,
atk-s0203a:197_18: te bhikkhū gahetvā satthu santikaṃ āgato.
atk-s0203a:198_0: Satthāpi sāyanhasamaye ānandattherena upanītaṃ udakaṃ ādāya sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā migāramātupāsādapariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi,
atk-s0203a:199_5: candimasūriyānaṃ pabhaṃ makkhetvā chabbaṇṇā yamakabuddharasmiyo vijjotamānā puñjā puñjā hutvā disāvidisāsu
atk-s0203a:199_12: Evaṃ sannisinnāya parisāya thero uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ pañhassa okāsaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0203a:199_14: “sace imasmiṃ ṭhitake pucchante ‘ācariyo no uṭṭhito’ti sesabhikkhū uṭṭhahissanti,
atk-s0203a:199_18: ekaggā hutvā dhammadesanaṃ paṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇissanti.
atk-s0203a:199_20: Tato ekaggā dhammadesanaṃ paṭicchituṃ sakkuṇissantī”ti iminā kāraṇena bhagavā ṭhitassa akathetvā nisīdāpetīti.
atk-s0203a:200_2: Thero pana pañcakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ patto mahākhīṇāsavo,
atk-s0203a:200_4: Jānantenapi pana ajānantena viya hutvā pucchituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a:200_6: “jānāti aya”nti tassa tassa vissajjento ekadesameva katheti.
atk-s0203a:200_7: Ajānantena viya pucchite pana kathento ito ca etto ca kāraṇaṃ āharitvā pākaṭaṃ katvā katheti.
atk-s0203a:200_8: Koci pana ajānantopi jānanto viya pucchati.
atk-s0203a:200_10: jānantoyeva pana ajānanto viya pucchatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:201_2: haritālavaṇṇo vā manosilāvaṇṇo vā siyanti pattheti.
atk-s0203a:201_4: nīluppalavaṇṇo vā añjanavaṇṇo vā atasīpupphavaṇṇo vā siyanti pattheti.
atk-s0203a:201_5: Evaṃvedanoti kusalavedano vā sukhavedano vā siyanti pattheti.
atk-s0203a:201_7: Yasmā pana atīte patthanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a:201_8: patthentenāpi ca na sakkā taṃ laddhuṃ,
atk-s0203a:201_10: na hi odāto kāḷabhāvaṃ patthetvā paccuppanne kāḷo hoti,
atk-s0203a:201_14: dānaṃ pana datvā sīlaṃ vā samādiyitvā “anāgate khattiyo vā homi brāhmaṇo vā”ti patthentassa patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0203a:202_0: Khandhādhivacananti khandhānaṃ khandhapaṇṇatti kittakena hotīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a:203_0: Mahābhūtā hetūti “tayo kusalahetū”tiādīsu hi hetuhetu vutto.
atk-s0203a:203_4: Tattha pathavīdhātu mahābhūtaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhūtānaṃ upādārūpassa ca paññāpanāya dassanatthāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a:204_3: phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vacanato phasso tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a:204_4: Viññāṇakkhandhassāti ettha paṭisandhiviññāṇena tāva saddhiṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ uparimaparicchedena samatiṃsa
atk-s0203a:204_5: rūpāni sampayuttā ca tayo khandhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0203a:204_6: taṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a:204_9: Taṃ nāmarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a:205_2: bhanteti idaṃ kittakena nu khoti vaṭṭaṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a:205_3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti idaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a:206_1: Ayaṃ rūpe assādoti iminā pariññāpaṭivedho ceva dukkhasaccañca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a:206_2: Ayaṃ rūpe ādīnavoti iminā pahānapaṭivedho ceva samudayasaccañca.
atk-s0203a:206_3: Idaṃ rūpe nissaraṇanti iminā sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho ceva nirodhasaccañca.
atk-s0203a:206_4: Ye imesu tīsu ṭhānesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammā,
atk-s0203a:207_3: “Saviññāṇake kāye”ti vacanena vā attano ca parassa ca kāyo gahitova,
atk-s0203a:208_2: Kamattānaṃ phusissantīti katarasmiṃ attani ṭhatvā vipākaṃ dassentīti sassatadassanaṃ okkamanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a:208_5: Saṭṭhimattānanti ime bhikkhū pakatikammaṭṭhānaṃ jahitvā aññaṃ navakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantā pallaṅkaṃ abhinditvā tasmiṃyeva āsane arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0203a:212_2: Tattha tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ anuviloketi,
atk-s0203a:212_4: Anuviloketvāti pañcapasādapaṭimaṇḍitāni akkhīni ummīletvā tato tato viloketvā antamaso hatthakukkuccapādakukkuccānampi abhāvaṃ disvā.
atk-s0203a:212_6: bhanteti yasmā andho andhaṃ viya so taṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0203a:212_8: Eteneva nayena ito paresupi vāresu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:212_21: dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti evaṃ attano dukkhatthāya cinteti.
atk-s0203a:212_22: Parabyābādhāyāti yathā asuko asukaṃ pāṇaṃ hanti,
atk-s0203a:212_25: evaṃ naṃ āṇāpessāmīti evaṃ parassa dukkhatthāya cinteti.
atk-s0203a:212_26: Ubhayabyābādhāyāti ahaṃ asukañca asukañca gahetvā dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti evaṃ ubhayadukkhatthāya cintetīti.
atk-s0203a:213_0: Attabyābādhāyapi mantetītiādīsu ahaṃ dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti mantento attabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a:213_1: Asukaṃ dasa akusalakammapathe samādapessāmīti mantento parabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a:213_3: “mayaṃ ubhopi ekato hutvā dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmā”ti mantento ubhayabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a:214_0: Asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ detīti deyyadhammampi puggalampi na sakkaroti.
atk-s0203a:214_1: Deyyadhammaṃ na sakkaroti nāma uttaṇḍulādidosasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ deti,
atk-s0203a:214_3: Puggalaṃ na sakkaroti nāma nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ asammajjitvā yattha vā tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā dānaṃ deti.
atk-s0203a:214_6: Acittikatvāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena deyyadhammepi puggalepi na cittīkāraṃ katvā deti.
atk-s0203a:214_7: Apaviddhanti chaḍḍetukāmo hutvā vammike uragaṃ pakkhipanto viya deti.
atk-s0203a:215_0: Tattha upapajjatīti na dānaṃ datvā niraye upapajjati.
atk-s0203a:215_1: Yaṃ pana tena pāpaladdhikāya micchādassanaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0203a:223_2: Tattha etadavocāti etaṃ “paṇḍito”tiādinā nayena dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa guṇakathaṃ avoca. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a:223_3: Avasesattheresu hi mahāmoggallānattherassa iddhimāti guṇo pākaṭo,
atk-s0203a:223_9: Evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ te te guṇā pākaṭā,
atk-s0203a:223_11: Paññavato hi guṇā na sakkā akathitā jānituṃ.
atk-s0203a:223_12: Iti bhagavā “sāriputtassa guṇe kathessāmī”ti sabhāgaparisāya sannipātaṃ āgamesi.
atk-s0203a:223_13: Visabhāgapuggalānañhi santike vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0203a:223_15: Imasmiṃ pana divase therassa sabhāgaparisā sannipati,
atk-s0203a:223_16: tassā sannipatitabhāvaṃ disvā satthā vaṇṇaṃ kathento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a:224_0: Tattha paṇḍitoti dhātukusalatā āyatanakusalatā paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito.
atk-s0203a:226_24: puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
atk-s0203a:227_1: idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0203a:227_21: hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā.
atk-s0203a:228_3: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a:228_8: sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a:228_10: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a:228_13: anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a:228_16: vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a:228_19: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a:228_20: nirodhadhammanti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti
atk-s0203a:229_6: uppannaṃ rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ,
atk-s0203a:229_13: sabbe bhavagāmikamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0203a:229_17: cha ca abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā passitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0203a:230_1: idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu,
atk-s0203a:230_2: anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā.
atk-s0203a:231_0: Anupadadhammavipassananti samāpattivasena vā jhānaṅgavasena vā anupaṭipāṭiyā dhammavipassanaṃ vipassati,
atk-s0203a:231_4: Mahāmoggallānatthero hi sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto satta divase vāyamitvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0203a:231_5: Sāriputtatthero ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca sammasanacāraṃ sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasi.
atk-s0203a:231_8: “ṭhapetvā buddhe ca paccekabuddhe ca añño sāvako nāma paññāya mayā pattabbaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0203a:231_9: Yathā hi puriso veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmīti mahājaṭaṃ veḷuṃ disvā jaṭaṃ chindantassa papañco bhavissatīti
atk-s0203a:231_10: antarena hatthaṃ pavesetvā sampattameva yaṭṭhiṃ mūle ca agge ca chinditvā ādāya pakkameyya,
atk-s0203a:231_12: yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati.
atk-s0203a:231_13: Aparo ca tathārūpameva veṇuṃ disvā “sace sampattaṃ yaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0203a:231_14: sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhissāmī”ti kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahantena satthena veṇujaṭaṃ chinditvā sārā ceva ujū ca yaṭṭhiyo uccinitvā ādāya pakkameyya.
atk-s0203a:231_16: yaṭṭhiyo pana sārā ceva ujū ca labhati.
atk-s0203a:231_17: Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ therānaṃ padhānaṃ.
atk-s0203a:232_0: Evaṃ pana addhamāsaṃ vāyamitvā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero sūkarakhataleṇadvāre bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa
atk-s0203a:232_1: vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne dasabalaṃ bījayamāno ṭhito desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0203a:232_2: pannarasame divase sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patvā sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni paṭivijjhitvā soḷasavidhaṃ
atk-s0203a:233_2: sāriputtassa anupadadhammavipassanāyāti yā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ vipassatīti anupadadhammavipassanā vuttā,
atk-s0203a:233_4: Idāni vattabbaṃ taṃ taṃ vipassanākoṭṭhāsaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a:234_1: Paṭhame jhāneti ye paṭhame jhāne antosamāpattiyaṃ dhammā.
atk-s0203a:234_3: Anupadavavatthitā hontīti anupaṭipāṭiyā vavatthitā paricchinnā ñātā viditā honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a:234_4: Thero hi te dhamme olokento abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko vattatīti jānāti.
atk-s0203a:234_18: Evaṃ jānaṃ abhiniropanaṭṭhena vitakkaṃ sabhāvato vavatthapeti…pe…
atk-s0203a:235_0: Viditā uppajjantīti uppajjamānā viditā pākaṭāva hutvā uppajjanti.
atk-s0203a:235_1: Viditā upaṭṭhahantīti tiṭṭhamānāpi viditā pākaṭāva hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0203a:235_2: Viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti nirujjhamānāpi viditā pākaṭāva hutvā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0203a:235_3: Ettha pana taṃñāṇatā ceva ñāṇabahutā ca mocetabbā.
atk-s0203a:235_4: Yathā hi teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ na sakkā phusituṃ,
atk-s0203a:235_5: evameva teneva cittena tassa cittassa uppādo vā ṭhiti vā bhaṅgo vā na sakkā jānitunti.
atk-s0203a:235_7: Yadi pana dve cittāni ekato uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0203a:235_8: ekena cittena ekassa uppādo vā ṭhiti vā bhaṅgo vā sakkā bhaveyya jānituṃ.
atk-s0203a:235_9: Dve pana phassā vā vedanā vā saññā vā cetanā vā cittāni vā ekato uppajjanakāni nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a:235_13: Mahātherassa antosamāpattiyaṃ soḷasa dhammā viditā pākaṭā hontīti.
atk-s0203a:235_15: Therena hi vatthu ceva ārammaṇañca pariggahitaṃ,
atk-s0203a:235_16: tenassa tesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādaṃ āvajjantassa uppādo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0203a:235_19: Tena vuttaṃ “viditā uppajjanti viditā upaṭṭhahanti viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0203a:236_5: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyutto.
atk-s0203a:237_0: Tattha dve mariyādā kilesamariyādā ca ārammaṇamariyādā ca.
atk-s0203a:237_1: Sace hissa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme ārabbha rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0203a:237_3: tesu panassa ekopi na uppannoti kilesamariyādā natthi.
atk-s0203a:237_4: Sace panassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme āvajjantassa ekacce āpāthaṃ nāgaccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0203a:237_6: Te panassa soḷasa dhamme āvajjantassa āpāthaṃ anāgatadhammo nāma natthīti ārammaṇamariyādāpi natthi.
atk-s0203a:238_0: Aparāpi dve mariyādā vikkhambhanamariyādā ca samucchedamariyādā ca.
atk-s0203a:238_3: Tassa vikkhambhitapaccanīkattā natthīti vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati.
atk-s0203a:239_1: Aññesu ca suttesu “uttari nissaraṇa”nti nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a:239_2: idha pana anantaro viseso adhippetoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a:239_4: Atthitvevassa hotīti tassa therassa atthītiyeva daḷhataraṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:240_0: Dutiyavāre pana sampasādanaṭṭhena sampasādo. Sabhāvato vavatthapeti.
atk-s0203a:241_1: Passaddhattā cetaso anābhogoti yo so “yadeva tattha sukha”nti cetaso ābhogo,
atk-s0203a:241_2: etenetaṃ oḷārikamakkhāyatīti evaṃ passaddhattā cetaso anābhogo vutto,
atk-s0203a:242_1: Sato vuṭṭhahatīti satiyā samannāgato ñāṇena sampajāno hutvā vuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a:242_2: Te dhamme samanupassatīti yasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatane buddhānaṃyeva anupadadhammavipassanā hoti,
atk-s0203a:243_0: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni disvā cattāro āsavā khīṇā honti.
atk-s0203a:243_1: Sāriputtattherassa samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā arahattaṃ pattavāropi atthi,
atk-s0203a:243_4: nirodhaṃ pana ciṇṇavasitāya aparāparaṃ samāpajjissatīti vadanti.
atk-s0203a:244_0: Tatthassa yasmiṃ kāle nirodhasamāpatti sīsaṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a:244_6: Jambudīpavāsino therā pana vadanti “sāriputtatthero samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikatvā nirodhaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0203a:244_11: tasmā te vā vipassatīti dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a:245_3: Orasotiādīsu thero bhagavato ure nibbattasaddaṃ sutvā jātoti oraso,
atk-s0203a:245_4: mukhena pabhāvitaṃ saddaṃ sutvā jātoti mukhato jāto,
atk-s0203a:245_5: dhammena pana jātattā nimmitattā dhammajo dhammanimmito,
atk-s0203a:249_2: Tattha khīṇā jātītiādīsu ekenāpi padena aññā byākatāva hoti, dvīhipi.
atk-s0203a:249_3: Idha pana catūhi padehi aññabyākaraṇaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0203a:249_4: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditātiādīsu yāya cetanāya diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ meti vadati,
atk-s0203a:249_9: parinibbutassa panassa sabbopi khīṇāsavassa sakkāro kātabbo.
atk-s0203a:249_10: Uttariṃ pañhoti sace panassa veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭhā hotha,
atk-s0203a:249_12: Ito paresupi tīsu vāresu ayameva nayo.
atk-s0203a:250_8: Cittañhi taṇhādiṭṭhīhi sakkāyadhammesu tiṭṭhati adhitiṭṭhatīti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo cetaso adhiṭṭhānā,
atk-s0203a:251_7: Na anattato upagacchinti ahaṃ attāti attakoṭṭhāsena na upagamiṃ.
atk-s0203a:251_8: Na ca pathavīdhātunissitanti pathavīdhātunissitā sesadhātuyo ca upādārūpañca arūpakkhandhā ca.
atk-s0203a:251_9: Tepi hi nissitavatthurūpānaṃ pathavīdhātunissitattā ekena pariyāyena pathavīdhātunissitāva.
atk-s0203a:251_10: Tasmā “na ca pathavīdhātunissita”nti vadanto sesarūpārūpadhammepi attato na upagacchinti vadati.
atk-s0203a:251_11: Ākāsadhātunissitapade pana avinibbhogavasena sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma,
atk-s0203a:251_14: Viññāṇadhātunissitapade pana sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca viññāṇadhātunissitanti rūpārūpaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0203a:252_1: Rūpe cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesūti ettha yaṃ atīte cakkhudvārassa āpāthaṃ āgantvā niruddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a:252_5: Yaṃ pana atītepi āpāthaṃ anāgantvā niruddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a:252_8: taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbadhammesu saṅgahitanti vutte tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero āha –
atk-s0203a:252_12: Tasmā tīsu kālesu āpāthaṃ āgataṃ vā anāgataṃ vā sabbampi taṃ rūpameva,
atk-s0203a:252_13: cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā pana tayo khandhā cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbadhammāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a:253_4: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti idaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ dibbacakkhuñca avatvā kasmā vuttaṃ?
atk-s0203a:253_10: Ettha hi cattāro vohārā pañca khandhā cha dhātuyo cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni attano saviññāṇakakāyo
atk-s0203a:253_11: paresaṃ saviññāṇakakāyoti ime cha koṭṭhāsā visuddhā,
atk-s0203a:253_13: Parasamuddavāsittherā pana attano ca parassa ca viññāṇakakāyaṃ ekameva katvā catūhi āhārehi saddhinti cha koṭṭhāse vadanti.
atk-s0203a:254_0: Ime pana cha koṭṭhāsā “kiṃ te adhigataṃ,
atk-s0203a:254_5: katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti evaṃ vinayaniddesapariyāyena sodhetabbā.
atk-s0203a:255_0: Ettha hi kiṃ te adhigatanti adhigamapucchā,
atk-s0203a:255_1: jhānavimokkhādīsu sotāpattimaggādīsu vā kiṃ tayā adhigataṃ.
atk-s0203a:255_4: kiṃ tayā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dhuraṃ katvā adhigataṃ,
atk-s0203a:256_2: kiṃ rattiṭṭhāne divāṭṭhāne rukkhamūle maṇḍape katarasmiṃ vā vihāreti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:256_3: Katame te kilesā pahīnāti pahīnakilese pucchati,
atk-s0203a:256_4: kataramaggavajjhā tava kilesā pahīnāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:257_1: paṭhamamaggādīsu katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:258_0: Tasmā idāni cepi koci bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammādhigamaṃ byākareyya,
atk-s0203a:258_2: Imesu pana chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo “kiṃ te adhigataṃ,
atk-s0203a:258_9: aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu rūpārūpaajjhattabahiddhādibhedesu vā dhammesu kena mukhena abhinivisitvāti?
atk-s0203a:259_6: Sace “amukasmiṃ nāma me kāle adhigata”nti vadati,
atk-s0203a:259_11: Sace “amukasmiṃ nāma me okāse adhigata”nti vadati,
atk-s0203a:259_15: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnakilesā pākaṭā honti.
atk-s0203a:260_0: Sace “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti vadati,
atk-s0203a:260_7: Bahussutā hi uggahaparipucchākusalā bhikkhū imāni cha ṭhānāni sodhetuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0203a:260_10: “imāya paṭipadāya lokuttaradhammā nāma na labbhantī”ti apanetabbo.
atk-s0203a:261_1: “dīgharattaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu appamatto jāgariyamanuyutto catūsu paccayesu alaggo ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā viharatī”ti paññāyati,
atk-s0203a:261_2: tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃ saṃsandati sameti.
atk-s0203a:261_3: “Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena saddhiṃ saṃsandati sameti,
atk-s0203a:261_4: evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati sameti nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a:262_0: Apica kho ettakenāpi sakkāro na kātabbo. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a:262_1: Ekaccassa hi puthujjanassāpi sato khīṇāsavapaṭipattisadisā paṭipadā hoti.
atk-s0203a:262_2: Tasmā so bhikkhu tehi tehi upāyehi uttāsetabbo.
atk-s0203a:262_3: Khīṇāsavassa nāma asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā na hoti,
atk-s0203a:263_1: dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero kira ekaṃ piṇḍapātikaṃ pariggahetuṃ asakkonto daharassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0203a:263_2: So taṃ nhāyamānaṃ kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāre nimujjitvā pāde aggahesi.
atk-s0203a:263_5: Candamukhatissarājakāle pana mahāvihāre saṅghatthero khīṇāsavo dubbalacakkhuko vihāreyeva acchi.
atk-s0203a:263_6: Rājā theraṃ pariggaṇhissāmīti bhikkhūsu bhikkhācāraṃ gatesu appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā sappo viya pāde aggahesi.
atk-s0203a:263_7: Thero silāthambho viya niccalo hutvā ko etthāti āha? Ahaṃ, bhante, tissoti.
atk-s0203a:264_0: Ekacco pana puthujjanopi atisūro hoti nibbhayo.
atk-s0203a:264_2: Vasabharājāpi hi ekaṃ theraṃ pariggaṇhamāno ghare nisīdāpetvā tassa santike badarasāḷavaṃ maddamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0203a:264_6: dibbesupi rasesu nikanti nāma na hoti.
atk-s0203a:264_7: Tasmā imehi upāyehi pariggahetvā sacassa bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā rasataṇhā vā uppajjati,
atk-s0203a:264_9: Sace pana abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī hutvā sīho viya nisīdati,
atk-s0203a:264_11: Ayaṃ bhikkhu sampannaveyyākaraṇo samantā rājarājamahāmattādīhi pesitaṃ sakkāraṃ arahatīti.
atk-s0203a:268_4: Evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāpi puna yathā nāma maggakusalo puriso vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0203a:268_6: evaṃ pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ desento katamo ca,
atk-s0203a:268_9: Tattha uccākulāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā.
atk-s0203a:268_11: So tattha pujjoti so bhikkhu tesu bhikkhūsu pūjāraho.
atk-s0203a:269_0: Mahākulāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā vessakulā vā.
atk-s0203a:269_5: Yattha katthaci kule jāto hi puññabalehi mahābhogopi uḷārabhogopi hotiyeva.
atk-s0203a:270_2: Appaññātāti rattiṃ khittasarā viya saṅghamajjhādīsu na paññāyanti.
atk-s0203a:271_3: Imasmiñca sutte pāḷiyaṃ naveva dhutaṅgāni āgatāni,
atk-s0203a:271_6: taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese vuttameva.
